XIII.i.4.C.1.p
.
Dental Examinations in Treatment Claims
Generally, a claim for dental treatment may be rated on service records without a dental examination. However, a dental examination may be required to identify teeth or chronic periodontal disease for which SC for treatment or examination purposes may be in order under
38 CFR 17.160
.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section C - Ratings for Dental Treatment Purposes
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section C
